title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 February 2015 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
11:16 <vmassol> (when xwiki crashes)  
11:17 <vmassol> strange it's not makred inactive in the config so it should restart by itself normally  
11:17 <vmassol> oh  
11:17 <vmassol> the scheduler is not active  
11:17 <vmassol> that's why  
11:17 <vmassol> restarting it  
11:18 <vmassol> I must have stopped it when thomas put xwiki.org in readonly last week  
11:46 <vmassol> oops sorry I've just disconnected agent11  
11:46 <vmassol> there was a 6.4 platform build on it...  
11:46 <vmassol> restarting that build on another agent  
11:47 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
12:16 <vmassol> I think I won't merge the translations for 6.2.x, wdyt?  
12:16 <vmassol> seems dangerous to me  
12:18 <vmassol> still hesitating...  
12:18 <evalica> :)  
12:18 <evalica> anyway … the translations are not done yet … Benjamin  
12:18 <evalica> is still translating on l10n  
12:19 <vmassol> this is for 6.2.6  
12:19 <vmassol> and I have pulled them already  
12:19 <evalica> you partially pulled since they are not complete  
12:20 <vmassol> the issue would be if propertie shave been reused  
12:20 <vmassol> that doesn't make sense caty  
12:20 <vmassol> they're never complete  
12:20 <evalica> :) k  
12:20 <vmassol> my worry is not that they're not compelte (they never are)  
12:20 <vmassol> but more that I would break something  
12:21 <vmassol> if someone has reused a properyt for something else (which is forbidden normally)  
12:21 <vmassol> or removed an existing property  
12:21 <vmassol> or changed parameters  
12:21 <evalica> the think is that the translations I've added were usually for new things  
12:21 <evalica> like 6.4+  
12:21 <vmassol> that's ok  
12:21 <vmassol> new stuff won't break old stuff  
12:21 <vmassol> I see mostly existing stuff changed  
12:22 <evalica> mostly macros - so collision is more difficult since they were marked with rendering…  
12:22 <evalica> aaa…. regarding the existing stuff… maybe they appear  
12:22 <evalica> since 8+ resource files  
12:22 <vmassol> I've seen an important change, from Bivenue sur votre wiki to Accueil  
12:22 <evalica> were missing from the release script  
12:23 <evalica> yes … the Accueil… was a bug http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11560  
12:23 <vmassol> ok I'll take the risk  
12:23 <vmassol> WDYM about 11560?  
12:23 <vmassol> I see it's now Accueil  
12:23 <vmassol> is that right or wrong?  
12:23 <evalica> yes …. it's correct  
12:24 <evalica> I'm just explaining why it had changed  
12:24 <vmassol> ok it looked the other way around to me  
12:24 <vmassol> :)  
12:24 <vmassol> I preferred http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/attachment/30283/7.0-Snapshot.png over http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/attachment/30284/after\_7.0-M1-6.4.1.png but YMMV  
13:08 <lucaa1> has quit  
13:08 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
13:16 <lucaa> has quit  
13:16 <tmortagne> has quit  
13:25 <Slashman> has quit  
13:47 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
13:49 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: if you need agent1-1 for the 6.4.2 release, I'll be done with it in about 10-15 minutes I think  
13:59 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: maven release done for 6.2.6, a1-1 is all yours now  
14:04 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:09 <vmassol> spam starting  
14:16 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: thanks  
14:18 <vmassol> now waiting for ow2 to sync… always a pain  
14:18 <gdelhumeau> has left #xwiki  
14:19 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
14:27 <vmassol> come on ow2!!! I'd like to move on  
14:33 <vmassol> going to remove the 6.3.1 and 5.4.8 branches from jira/git/jenkins, let me know if you don't agree  
14:33 <vmassol> our LTS is now 6.4.1 and will be 6.4.2 tomorrow  
14:34 <vmassol> Enygma`, evalica, mflorea, tl   
14:34 <vmassol> oops  
14:34 <vmassol> tmortagne, gdelhumeau  
14:35 <vmassol> s/6.3.1/stable-6.3.x  
14:35 <vmassol> s/5.4.8/stable-5.4.x  
14:56 <Pbas> Ho sorry Vincent I didn't take the time to test JNDI connection: you (team) are too fast for me...  
14:57 <vmassol> ok, please try it when you have some time  
14:57 <Pbas> I will  
14:58 <Pbas> Probably next week (I have a dead line for end of this month)

16:30 <vmassol> cool

17:59 <gdelhumeau> I'll be away for 1 hour

19:06 <vmassol> guys , this test look like a real failure http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-index-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.index.test.ui/AllDocsTest/treeViewTabWithSpecialCharactersInEntityNames/  
19:06 <vmassol> I get it locally too  
19:06 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
19:06 <vmassol> mflorea: this test look like a real failure http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-index-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.index.test.ui/AllDocsTest/treeViewTabWithSpecialCharactersInEntityNames/  
19:06 <vmassol> I get it too  
19:06 <vmassol> do you think you could check it?  
19:07 <vmassol> tmortagne: I also get this one locally too: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-filter-test-tests/940/testReport/org.xwiki.filter.test.ui/FilterTest/testConvertXMLURL/  
19:07 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you think you could look into it?  
19:11 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:15 <mflorea> vmassol: I haven't touched the tree. I'll take a look tomorrow  
19:16 <vmassol> ok thanks
